## Scraping Website
Library
```{r}
if (!("revest" %in% installed.packages())){
  install.packages("rvest")
}
library(rvest)
```

Website
```{r}
wiki_url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma-separated_values"
wiki_web <- read_html(wiki_url)
```

Findng Examples and Retrieving Text
```{r}
wiki_examples <- wiki_web %>% html_nodes(xpath = '//h2[contains(., "Example")]//following-sibling::pre') %>% html_text()

wiki_examples
```
Retrieving First Table
```{r}
wiki_table <- wiki_examples[1]
```

### Saving to CSV File
```{r}
write.table(wiki_table, file="car.csv", quote = FALSE, col.names = FALSE, row.names = FALSE, append = FALSE)
```

### Check to see saved
```{r}
read.csv("car.csv")
```
